name: Trail of Destruction
description: You fly a ship that leaves behind a trail. If you complete a circle, enemies within will be destroyed. Exciting abilities and a dynamic arena with events and items make this difficult task more feasible.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller recommended
